Package org.whiteflagprotocol.java

Class WfMessage

java.lang.Object
org.whiteflagprotocol.java.core.WfMessageCore
org.whiteflagprotocol.java.WfMessage
public class WfMessage extends WfMessageCore
Whiteflag message class

This is a class representing a Whiteflag message. It contains all methods to handle a Whiteflag message, e.g. to encode, decode, etc. It also provides static factory methods to create Whiteflag messages in different ways from various data.

Since:
1.0
Whiteflag version:
v1-draft.6

    • create

      public static WfMessage create(String messageCode) throws WfException
      Creates a new empty Whiteflag message object of the specified type
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the code indicating the message type to be created
      Returns:
      a new WfMessage Whiteflag message
      Throws:
      WfException

      public static WfMessage deserialize(String serializedMsg) throws WfException
      Creates a new Whiteflag message object from a serialized message

      serializedMsg - the uncompressed serialized message
      Returns:
      a WfMessage Whiteflag message
      Throws:
      WfException - if the serialization of the message is invalid

      1.1

    • serialize

      public String serialize() throws WfException
      Returns the cached serialized message, or else it serialzes and caches Whiteflag message
      Overrides:
      serialize in class WfMessageCore
      Returns:
      the serialized message, i.e. the concatinated string of field values
      Throws:
      WfException - if any of the field does not contain valid data
